meanings.sent1: The misparted puzzle pieces did not fit together properly.
meanings.sent2: The misparted bookshelf had uneven shelves.
meanings.sent3: The misparted socks made the clown look even sillier.
meanings.sent4: Her misparted hair resembled a tangled mess of branches.
meanings.sent5: The misparted jigsaw puzzle was impossible to complete.

meanings.definition: Misparted: to divide or separate incorrectly
meanings.sent1: She misparted the cake into unequal slices.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter misparted the wood, causing a crooked table.
meanings.sent3: He misparted the laundry, mixing colors with whites.
meanings.sent4: The chef misparted the ingredients, resulting in a strange flavor.
meanings.sent5: The teacher misparted the students into random groups.
